strings.ITEM_ANCESTRALINCUBATOR_DESC:
<style=cIsDamage>7%</style> chance <style=cStack>(+1% per stack)</style> on kill to <style=cIsUtility>summon an Ancestral Pod</style> that distracts enemies. 
Once it fully grows, it will hatch into an allied <style=cIsDamage>Parent</style> with <style=cIsHealing>200% health</style> <style=cStack>(+100% per stack)</style> and with <style=cIsDamage>400% damage</style>. <style=cIsDamage>Parents</style> limited to 1 <style=cStack>(+1 per stack)</style>
strings.ITEM_DRIZZLEPLAYERHELPER_DESC: Increase <style=cIsHealing>base health regeneration</style> by <style=cIsHealing>50%</style> and <style=cIsUtility>armor</style> by <style=cIsUtility>70 <style=cStack>(+70% per stack)</style></style>.
strings.ITEM_USEAMBIENTLEVEL_PICKUP: Use the Ambient level as your level
strings.ITEM_USEAMBIENTLEVEL_DESC: Your <style=cIsUtility>level</style> is equal or greater than the <style=cIsUtility>ambient level</style>
strings.ITEM_CRIPPLEWARDONLEVEL_PICKUP: (Old Effigy of Grief) Drop a crippling effigy upon enemy level up
strings.ITEM_CRIPPLEWARDONLEVEL_DESC: When the enemy team level ups, summon a <color=#307FFF>Effigy of Grief</color> <style=cIsUtility>cripple</style> zone <style=cIsHealth>at your location</style>
strings.ITEM_CRITHEAL_DESC:
When <style=cIsHealing>healing</style>, have a chance equivelent to your <style=cIsDamage>critical rate</style> to <style=cIsHealing>double the amount</style>. 
Gain <style=cIsDamage>10% critical chance</style> and then <style=cIsDamage>halve</style><style=cStack> (-33% per stack)</style> your <style=cIsDamage>critical chance</style>
strings.ITEM_WARCRYONCOMBAT_PICKUP: (Old Berzerker's Pauldron) Enter a frenzy at the beginning of combat.
strings.ITEM_WARCRYONCOMBAT_DESC: When entering combat emmit a <style=cIsDamage>War Cry</style> for <style=cIsDamage>6 seconds</style><style=cStack> (+4s per stack)</style> buffing you and allies in a <style=cIsDamage>12m radius</style><style=cStack> (+4m per stack)</style> increasing <style=cIsUtility>movement speed</style> by <style=cIsUtility>50%</style> and <style=cIsDamage>attack speed</style> by <style=cIsDamage>100%</style>. Recharges every 30 seconds.
strings.ITEM_TEMPESTONKILL_PICKUP: (Old Wax Quail) Chance to summon a buffing tempest on kill
strings.ITEM_TEMPESTONKILL_DESC: <style=cIsUtility>25%</style> chance on kill to spawn a <style=cIsUtility>buffing tempest</style> which will buff you with <style=cIsDamage>Malachite Elite</style> for <style=cIsDamage>2 seconds</style> and expire after <style=cIsUtility>8<style=cStack> (+6 per stack)</style> seconds</style>
strings.ITEM_MINIONLEASH_PICKUP: Teleport to your master if he is too far away.
strings.ITEM_MINIONLEASH_DESC: You are on a leashed to your master. Teleport you back to him if too far away. If you have no master to be leashed to, lag the game instead.
strings.ITEM_AACANNON_DESC: A unfinished item that does nothing.
strings.ITEM_PLASMACORE_DESC: A unfinished item that does nothing.
strings.ITEM_PLANTONHIT_DESC: A unfinished item that does nothing. Potentially early version of Deskplant.
strings.ITEM_MAGEATTUNEMENT_DESC: A unfinished idea that does not function.
strings.ITEM_GHOST_PICKUP: Become a Ghost without a hitbox.
strings.ITEM_GHOST_DESC: Become permamently <style=cIsUtility>immune to damage</style> and <style=cIsUtility>undetectable</style> if you don't deal damage
strings.ITEM_TELEPORTWHENOOB_PICKUP: Teleport to safety when out of bounds.
strings.ITEM_TELEPORTWHENOOB_DESC: You will teleport back to the map when out of bounds. This is just for enemies as players do this normally.
strings.ITEM_MINHEALTHPERCENTAGE_PICKUP: Prevent HP from going below an amount
strings.ITEM_MINHEALTHPERCENTAGE_DESC: <style=cIsHealing>Health</style> will not go below <style=cIsHealing>1%<style=cStack> (+1% per stack)
strings.ITEM_INVADINGDOPPELGANGER_DESC: Reduce <style=cIsDamage>damage</style> by <style=cIsDamage>96%</style> and increase <style=cIsHealing>maximum health</style> by <style=cIsHealing>900%</style>.
strings.ITEM_ADAPTIVEARMOR_DESC: Gain upwards of <style=cIsUtility>400 Armor</style> depending on the amount of damage taken recently
strings.ITEM_SKULLCOUNTER_DESC:
Proof of a specific kind of kill. Has no direct effect of its own. 
Previously used for Bandits Desperado skill
strings.ITEM_TEAMSIZEDAMAGEBONUS_DESC: Increases <style=cIsDamage>damage</style> by <style=cIsDamage>100% <style=cStack>(+100% per stack)</style></style> for every <style=cIsUtility>minion</style> you own.
strings.ITEM_CONVERTCRITCHANCETOCRITDAMAGE_PICKU: Convert all crit chance into crit damage multiplier
strings.ITEM_CONVERTCRITCHANCETOCRITDAMAGE_DESC: All <style=cIsDamage>crit chance</style> will be converted into <style=cIsDamage>crit damage multiplier</style> making them deal more damage. You will be unable to deal <style=cIsDamage>Critical Strikes</style> randomly.
strings.ITEM_VOIDMANPASSIVEITEM_DESC: A item at one point responsible for Void Fiends passive, however it does nothing.
strings.ITEM_GUMMYCLONEIDENTIFIER_DESC: Visually turns you into a Gummy character created by Goobo Jr.
strings.ITEM_EMPOWERALWAYS_DESC: A unfinished item that does nothing.
strings.ITEM_DRONEWEAPONSDISPLAY1_DESC: Spare Drone Parts common Item Display for Drones.
strings.ITEM_DRONEWEAPONSDISPLAY2_DESC: Spare Drone Parts rare Item Display for Drones.
strings.ITEM_DRONEWEAPONSBOOST_PICKUP: Bonus stats granted by Spare Drone Parts.
strings.ITEM_DRONEWEAPONSBOOST_DESC: Gain <style=cIsDamage>+50%</style><style=cStack>(+50% per stack)</style> <style=cIsDamage>attack speed</style> and <style=cIsDamage>skill cooldown reduction</style>, a <style=cIsDamage>10%</style> chance to fire a <style=cIsDamage>Micro Missile</style> dealing <style=cIsDamage>300%</style> base damage and gain an <style=cIsDamage>automatic chain gun</style> that deals <style=cIsDamage>6x100%</style>damage, bouncing to <style=cIsDamage>2</style> enemies.
strings.ITEM_SUMMONEDECHO_DESC: Reduce <style=cIsHealing>maximum health</style> by <style=cIsHealing>90%</style> and increase <style=cIsUtility>base movement speed</style> by <style=cIsUtility>66%</style>. Periodically shoot out <style=cIsDamage>homing projectiles</style> dealing <style=cIsDamage>275%</style> base damage and <style=cIsUtility>slowing</style> enemies on hit by <style=cIsUtility>50%</style> for <style=cIsUtility>2</style> seconds.
